mapper.select: select email, password, mname, gender, phone, photo, ctno, date_format(regdate,'%Y-%m-%d')regdate from member
mapper.insert: insert into member(email, password, mname, gender, phone, photo, ctno) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{mname}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{photo}, #{ctno})
INSERT INTO guider (email, introdution, quote, field, lang, currentjob, dept) VALUES (#{email}, #{introdution}, #{quote}, #{field}, #{lang}, #{currentjob}, #{dept});
mapper.select: SELECT email, password, mname FROM member WHERE email=#{email}
select m.EMAIL, m.MNAME, m.PASSWORD, m.GENDER, m.PHONE, m.PHOTO, m.CTNO, m.regdate, g.INTRODUTION, g.QUOTE, g.FIELD, g.LANG from member m join guider g on m.email = g.email where m.email = #{email}
